tasks.title: Scope new CLI command integration
tasks.description: greenfield benchmark scenario: Scope new CLI command integration.

workflow.goal: Localize the highest-impact code paths quickly.
workflow.prompt: Triage task: Scope new CLI command integration. Identify the primary modules and likely risk hotspots.

workflow.goal: Trace control/data flow across the relevant components.
workflow.prompt: Investigate task: Scope new CLI command integration. Follow request-to-effect flow and find likely failure/regression points.

workflow.goal: Define the minimal safe change plan.
workflow.prompt: Change task: Scope new CLI command integration. Specify minimal edits and dependency impacts for a safe implementation.

workflow.goal: Define verification criteria and regression checks.
workflow.prompt: Validate task: Scope new CLI command integration. List tests and checks that prove the issue is solved without regressions.
